name: Dracula's Library
detailed_description:
Dracula has summoned you to prepare his library for his coming absence. Dracula's books need to be safe for a long period of time. Many of the ancient texts cannot be touched by mortal hands or they will be damaged beyond repair. You must use your wand of lightning to invoke numerous spells to organize and seal the ancient tombs. Invisibility will then be cast at the end to protect them from thieves. You have only nine counter spells that will fix running out of time for the spells but can earn more through progress.

Dracula's library is a action/puzzle game built partly from the concept from Google's 2016 Halloween Magic Cat Academy, which was an excellent and fun game.
54 increasingly difficult levels.
Six symbol types that must be cast to properly seal the tomes.
Some variations of symbols can be figured out to shorten cast/draw times.
